roleset_name: divide into two parts by cutting through or across

roles.descr: focus, first mention of entity intersecting another
roles.descr_trans: 焦点，第一次提到与另一个实体相交的实体

roles.descr: thing arg0 is intersecting, entity divided in two
roles.descr_trans: 事物 arg0 相交，实体一分为二

roleset_name_trans: 通过切割或交叉分为两部分
